name: Citrus Rampage
description:
Call up your buddies and enjoy the acidic chaos of Citrus Rampage, a physics-based multiplayer shooter with silly guns and destructible environments. Play with up to 4 players in local multiplayer or online using Steam Remote Play Together. Your friends don’t need to own the game to play online with you!



  • A CORROSIVE ARSENAL

    Shoot your enemies with the gatling gun, blow them up with fireworks, scare them with the chicken gun, knock them down using the banana gun and much more!

  • EXPLODE AND SMASH

    Use physics-based havoc to kill enemies as you destroy the surrounding environment.

  • WATCH YOUR STEP

    Avoid traps or trigger them intentionally to surprise and eliminate your opponents.

  • ENHANCE YOUR POWER

    Collect power ups to become invulnerable, to change the flow of time, or to run faster to beat your opponents.

  • UNIQUE GAME MODES

    Play the classic Team Deathmatch and Capture The Flag, enjoy the funny Kick and Kill soccer mode or prove you are the best volleyball player!
